body:
You must be the new intern.
Working from home eh?
Well, don't be mistaken, it's still not going to be easy.
This is still med school after all.

Alright, we'll take things slow.
Hah!
Here's your first patient. Good luck!

title: 1 Miss
body:
Almost!
Try drumming on the back of your phone with your fingers. It helps your timing!

title: 1 Perfect
body:
Oh, look at you.
You clearly know how to do this already.
Congratulations.
That's it. One more time, without cues.

Alright. You've got the hang of it.
Your first patient is waiting outside.
He's got quite the heart rate...
(If you feel the calibration on your device is off..
You can change it by clicking the gear icon in the pause menu!)
Well, good luck.

title: 1 No Input
body:
Oh dear.
Remember to tap the screen on the SEVENTH BEAT.

title: 0 No Input
body:
Oh, tap the screen to advance the text.
There we go.
You really should know that kind of thing already.
